summary: This is an FBI 302 interview summary of a victim/witness, conducted on September 2, 2021. The witness describes meeting Ghislaine Maxwell before age 18, being groomed, and subsequently being sexually abused by Jeffrey Epstein during massages arranged by Maxwell. The witness also recounts being shown photographs and an address book, and mentions interactions with other high-profile individuals.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central perpetrator described by the witness. The witness details sexual abuse during massages he requested, his crude and aggressive behavior, and his interactions with others.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Described as the groomer and facilitator. She introduced the witness to Epstein, arranged the massages that turned sexual, and pressured the witness to recruit other girls.

persons.name: Alan Dershowitz
persons.context: Mentioned as being in Palm Beach with Epstein, discussing the OJ Simpson trial with him prior to the witness telling Epstein she no longer wanted to participate in sexual activities.

persons.name: Trump
persons.context: Mentioned as someone the witness was introduced to by Maxwell in New York, prior to the sexual abuse incidents detailed.

connections.description: Maxwell groomed and delivered the witness to Epstein for sexual abuse. She facilitated the massages, was present during initial interactions, and later asked the witness to recruit others for Epstein.
Maxwell introduced the witness to Trump in New York.
The witness recalls them discussing the OJ Simpson trial together in Palm Beach.
Maxwell groomed the witness, gained her trust by discussing her traumatic childhood, gave her gifts, and then manipulated her into sexual encounters with Epstein.
Epstein sexually abused the witness during massages, including forced touching and ejaculation. He also discussed having a baby with her.

events.title: FBI Interview of Victim/Witness
events.description: The victim/witness is interviewed by the FBI, with attorneys and an AUSA present. She provides detailed allegations of sexual abuse by Jeffrey Epstein, facilitated by Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: First Meeting and Sexual Abuse
events.description: The witness describes the first massage with Epstein, arranged by Maxwell, where he was naked and the encounter became sexual. A second, more explicitly sexual massage followed.

events.title: Gift from Epstein and Maxwell
events.description: The witness received a Prada bag with a note saying 'Love Jeffrey and Ghislaine,' which she believes was for her 18th birthday.

events.title: Recruitment Request
events.description: After the abuse, Maxwell asked the witness if she knew anyone 'young and pretty' who could come over to give Epstein a blow job, indicating the massages were a ruse.

events.title: Witness Confronts Epstein
events.description: In Palm Beach, the witness told Epstein she no longer wanted to participate in sexual activities.

keyFacts: The witness is '95% sure' she met Ghislaine Maxwell before she was 18 years old, and Maxwell discouraged her from going to school.
The witness describes a pattern of sexual abuse by Jeffrey Epstein during massages, which began with Maxwell present and facilitating the encounters.
Maxwell explicitly asked the witness to recruit other young girls for sexual acts with Epstein, stating he 'needed a lot of sexual attention.'
The witness was shown a nude photograph of herself during the interview, which she believed was taken in Palm Beach.
The document records the witness's recollection of being introduced to Trump by Maxwell and of Epstein discussing the OJ Simpson trial with Alan Dershowitz.
